description:
Social media is having an impact on local business.

Facebook has the numbers with over one billion users.

Twitter gives updates in real time about what is happening with your business.

Google lets you know where your business is and what it is about.

But what about the actual business? That is where Linkedin the largest social network for business comes in. This course will show you how to use Linkedin for your business and to market it through the social network..

Section One looks at the relationship of Linkedin and local business.

Section Two is about your profile and cmapny page.

Section Three looks at marketing.

Section Four provides examples of local business.

This course will help you understand how to use Linkedin to take your business to where you want it to be.
title: Linkedin Strategy For Local Business
